title: Relates to marine and coastal district party and charter boat licenses
summary: Relates to marine and coastal district party and charter boat licenses; provides that the department of environmental conservation may permit reissuance of a license to a member of the immediate family of the prior holder of such license; provided that the individual to whom the license or permit is being reissued is at least sixteen years of age; makes related provisions.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to marine and coastal district party and charter boat licenses; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
